import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import {filterPokemon} from "../../redux/actions"; import style from "./Filter.module.css" const Filter = ({ setCurrentPage }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handlerFilterPokemon = (event) => { dispatch(filterPokemon(event.target.value)); setCurrentPage(1) }; return(

Filter by

) } export default Filter;
